item.title: Wildy Skulls? :S
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Hey guys,

First of all, I suck client sided, and I know I have to do something to make the skull come through, but I’m not quite sure how I link the image to the client to make an interface type thing, to the server… I know I have to put it in like here:

And I know it’s something like this:

if (player.intINeedToMake < #) { intINeedToMake[player.intINeedToMake].drawSprite(spriteDrawX - 12, spriteDrawY - l); l += #; }

and I know I have to put this in Player.java (client and server I believe):

But how do I get the Skull Icon? I know it’s a number in the cache and I can easily get it but I don’t know where to put the number in these codes. Help please!

PS:
I have skullIcon but it doesn’t display the skull when I attack another player :S
